original_text: But Hezekiah did not thank the Lord for the kind thing that he had done for him. The king was too proud to do that. So the Lord became angry with him, and with the people of Judah and Jerusalem.
korean_text: 히스기야가 마음이 교만하여 그 받은 은혜를 보답하지 아니하므로 진노가 그와 유다와 예루살렘에 내리게 되었더니

sentences.original_text: But Hezekiah did not thank the Lord
for the kind thing that he had done for him
sentences.korean_translation: 주님께서 그를 위해 하신 친절한 일에 대해

sentences.original_text: The king was too proud to do that
So the Lord became angry with him
and with the people of Judah and Jerusalem
